net.sf.expectit.matcher

    The matcher factory.

    • Method Detail

      • matches

        public static Matcher<Result> matches(String pattern)
        Creates a matcher of String that matches when examined input fully matches the given regular expression.

        This method simply compiles the given pattern to a Pattern and passes it to the matches(java.util.regex.Pattern) method.

        Parameters:
        pattern - the pattern that represents regular expression
        Returns:
        the match result
        See Also:
        regexp(java.util.regex.Pattern)

      • matches

        public static Matcher<Result> matches(Pattern pattern)
        Creates a matcher of Pattern that matches when examined input fully matches the given regular expression. The operation is equivalent to the Matcher.matches() method.

        The returning Result implements the MatchResult methods to query the results of the regular expression match.

        If the match succeeded, the input buffer is cleared and Result.getBefore() returns an empty string.

        Parameters:
        pattern - the representation of a regular expression
        Returns:
        the match result

      • regexp

        public static Matcher<Result> regexp(String pattern)
        Creates a matcher of String that matches when examined input contains the given regular expression.

        This method simply compiles the given string to a Pattern and passes it to the regexp(java.util.regex.Pattern) method.

        Parameters:
        pattern - the string that represents regular expression
        Returns:
        the match result
        See Also:
        regexp(java.util.regex.Pattern)

      • regexp

        public static Matcher<Result> regexp(Pattern pattern)
        Creates a matcher of Pattern that matches when examined input contains the given regular expression. The operation is equivalent to the Matcher.find() method.

        The returning Result implements the MatchResult methods to query the results of the regular expression match.

        If the match succeeded, the input buffer is updated: the input part from the beginning until the end position of the match is removed.

        Parameters:
        pattern - the representation of a regular expression
        Returns:
        the match result

      • contains

        public static Matcher<Result> contains(String string)
        Creates a matcher of String that matches when examined input contains the given substring.

        The returning Result has no groups except the one with 0 index which represents the exact string match.

        If the match succeeded, the input buffer is updated: the input part from the beginning until the end position of the match is removed.

        Parameters:
        string - the string to search for
        Returns:
        the match result

      • allOf

        public static Matcher<MultiResult> allOf(Matcher<?>... matchers)
        Creates a matcher that matches if the examined input matches all of the specified matchers. This method evaluates all the matchers regardless intermediate results.

        The match result represents a combination of all match operations. If succeeded, the match result with the greatest end position is selected to implement the result Result instance returned by this method. If the result is negative, then the one which fails first is returned.

        If several matchers the have same end position, then the result from the one with the smaller argument index is returned.

        Parameters:
        matchers - the vararg array of the matchers
        Returns:
        the multi match result

      • anyOf

        public static Matcher<MultiResult> anyOf(Matcher<?>... matchers)
        Creates a matcher that matches if the examined input matches any of the specified matchers.

        The match result represents a combination of any match operations. If succeeded, the match result with the greatest end position is selected to implement the result Result instance returned by this method.

        If several matchers have the same end position, then the result from the one with the smaller argument index is returned.

        Parameters:
        matchers - the vararg array of the matchers
        Returns:
        the multi match result

      • eof

        public static Matcher<Result> eof()
        Creates a matcher that matches if input reaches the end of stream.

        If succeeded, the Result.getBefore() will return the entire input buffer, and the MatchResult.group() returns an empty string.

        Returns:
        the matcher

      • times

        public static Matcher<MultiResult> times(int number,
                         Matcher<?> matcher)
        Creates a matcher that matches if the given matcher matches the number of times.

        The match result represents a combination of all the performed match operations. If succeeded, the result with the greatest end position is returned.

        Parameters:
        number - the number of times which the given matcher must match the input
        matcher - the matcher
        Returns:
        the result

      • anyString

        public static Matcher<Result> anyString()
        Creates a matcher that matches when at least one character exists in the input buffer.

        If the result is successful, the Result.getBefore() returns an empty string, the MatchResult.group() returns the entire input buffer.

        Returns:
        the result
